name: Enhanced-Ex
description:
Improve your editing efficiency when in ex-mode.

This plugin provides a collection of functions and mappings to help you increase your productivity on the command-line. Functions include:
- Reverse search your ex history using regular expressions,
- Zap to any previously typed character,
- Capture all ex output in a *Messages* buffer for processing, just like in Emacs,
- and more.
install_details: Just put it in your ~/.vim/plugin/ directory, or load it manually in vim with the :source command.
